edit_profile: User can edit their own profile.
generate_insurance_report: User can generate a downloadable insurance report
activate_kiosk_mode: User can put the session into kiosk mode.
global_search: User can use global search in top nar bar.
options_read: User can read site wide options.
options_edit: User can edit site wide options.
checkout_issue: User can issue items and mark them lost or broken.
checkout_audit: User can audit items from Checkout desk, this includes changing item locations.
items_history: User can view item loaning history.
items_multi_status: User can update the status of multiple items.
groups_remove: User can remove group and transfer items to another group.
groups_override: User can override group limits when issuing items.
locations_remove: User can remove locations and transfer items to another location.
users_reset_password_attempts: User can reset another users password login attempts.
users_change_password: User can change another users password (requires user_edit).
users_change_role: User can change another users role (requires user_edit).
users_history: User can view another users loaning history.
users_multi_edit: User can edit multiple other users.
users_multi_remove: User can remove multiple other users.
courses_remove: User can remove courses and transfer users to another course.
years_remove: User can remove year groups and transfer users to another year group.
printers_remove: User can remove printers and transfer users to another printer.
roles_remove: User can remove and transfer users to another role.
roles_set_permissions: User can edit the permissions of a role.
email_queue_read: User can view the email queue.
email_queue_remove: User can remove emails from the queue before they are sent.
